sentences.sContent: The president’s popularity has declined considerably.
sentences.sCn: 总统的支持率大大下降了。

sentences.sContent: ...The popularity of TV led to the popularity of frozen food...
...their popularity didn't boom until televisions became popular a decade or so later...
...The growing popularity of the Internet has brought about great social changes...
...going to bars ranked eighth in popularity and gardening ranked ninth...
...the popularity of computer activities is increasing...
...The handicraft has been passed down from one generation to another and now enjoys more and more popularity both at home and abroad...
...The publishing house has to consider the popularity of this novel...

synos.tran: 普及，流行；名气；受大众欢迎

words.tran: 流行的，通俗的；受欢迎的；大众的；普及的
流行地；通俗地；普及地；大众地
流行音乐；汽水；砰然声；枪击
大众化的人；普及读物；普及者；使普及的人
突然出现；爆开；射击；瞪大；发出爆裂声
推广，普及；使…通俗化（等于popularize）；使…受欢迎
取出；开枪打；抛出；突然伸出；突然行动

trans.tranCn: 普及， 流行； 声望
trans.tranOther: when something or someone is liked or supported by a lot of people
